mapper.insert: insert into control_dic (id, dic_name, dic_code, dic_type, valid, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into control_dic
id,
dic_name,
dic_code,
dic_type,
valid,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select * from control_dic where valid =1
and dic_type = #{dicType}
mapper.insert: insert into control_dic (dic_name, dic_code, dic_type, valid, create_time, update_time) values (#{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
